title: WESTWORLD SEASON 3 Trailer Breakdown, Hidden Clues & More Explained!
author: Think Story
comment: Who's coming with me to season 3 to kill some Nazis?

The silver/shiny card is MiB's player profile at Westworld. In some scenes of ss2 when (alive) Ford and MiB at a bar/ corporate party, Ford passes the shiny card to MiB, saying "his game has just started". Then, MiB's wife finds his card and inserts it into a tablet and sees MiB living the erotic life in WW (specifically raping Dolores), and then MiB's wife commits suicide in the bathtub.
Can’t wait!! I hope we get season 1 quality for this new season! I’m feeling pretty confident we will!
I'm still confused af...but still excited

Thanks for the fantastic breakdown. I
Really look forward to it even tho I am disappointed the season will be short
description:
In this video we take a look at HBO's latest official Westworld Season 3 trailer and break it all down with new theories, hidden clues, and more explained.
